blueprint.label: Fulgora Mall
blueprint.description:
Place this beside the Scrap Processing output so it connects to power and the roboport logistics network.

This is based on the Super AutoMall:
https://www.factorio.school/view/-OBU-bOGO7Yi5uAWlAKj

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: substract crafted item, connect to product item inserter

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description: Set whitelist here, value must be 1, anything in the whitelist will be allowed to craft in the system, including dependent ingredients. For example, if you want to craft [item=transport-belt] with only iron plate available, you should whitelist [item=iron-gear-wheel] as well. Do not include anything that is unacceptable for the assembler, it will deadlock the system (a manual reset is needed in this case).

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description: set maximum network requests count allowed by adjusting [virtual-signal=up-arrow] number, for example, if you request 20[item=inserter], the system will process 10[item=inserter] each time due to the [virtual-signal=up-arrow]number is set 10

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description: set maximum ingrediant requests count allowed by adjusting [virtual-signal=up-arrow] number, for example, if you request 10[item=fast-underground-belt], which requires 200[item=iron-gear-wheel], the system will process 100[item=iron-gear-wheel] each batch due to the [virtual-signal=up-arrow] number is set as 100 here

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description: turn on and off this to reset, needed if anything unexpected is locked forever

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: latch, green wire for locker requests, remember isolation

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: if tick at 1/60(C), has no enough resource(X) and assembler is not working (check = 0), reset

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: isolation and delay, connect to output inserter

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: isolation and delay, connect to output inserter

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: network missing ingradient filter, negative means missing

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: get in assembling system items, and isloation
